quotes.quote: I tell you the past is a bucket of ashes, so live not in your yesterdays, no just for tomorrow, but in the here and now. Keep moving and forget the post mortems; and remember, no one can get the jump on the future.
Be patient and tough; someday this pain will be useful to you.
Healing yourself is connected with healing others.
Get over it. Get on with your life.
You don't get over it. You move past it. You move through it. You lose yourself to find it, and when found, it's yours and no longer theirs.
Get over it - If you have a bad workout or run a bad race, allow yourself exactly 1 hour to stew about it-then move on.
Don't get stuck with the thing that ruins your day. Smile and be happy. Life is too short to be wasted on negative thinking.
You can't change what has already happened so don't waste your time thinking about it. Move on, let go, and get over it.
I think that everybody needs somebody to really look up to and know that even though you're going through a tough time, you'll get over it.
Recovery is something that you have to work on every single day and it's something that it doesn't get a day off.
I've always believed that if you don't stay moving, they will throw dirt on you.
Some of think that holding on makes us strong, but sometimes it's letting go.
Get a grip, get a life, and get over it.
I had turned away from the picture and was going back to the world where events move, men change, light flickers, life flows in a clear stream, no matter whether over mud or over stones.
All love gets over, and we must get over it.
We must embrace pain and burn it as fuel for our journey.
If you keep telling the same sad small story, you will keep living the same sad small life.
Getting over a painful experience is much like crossing monkey bars: you have to let go at some point in order to move forward.
Cry me a river, build a bridge, and get over it.
Get over it and get started, life is too short to hesitate.
Get mad, then get over it.
Get over it - Life isn't Supposed to be fair. Get over yourself, and be of service to others.
I decided I can't pay a person to rewind time, so I may as well get over it.
You were many wonderful things to many people before you met him--don't let this one event define who you are.
There are some things that you'll never get over, but if you use all of your strength there's nothing that you can't get through.
